semantic_title: Coding Guidelines for Secondary Malignant Neoplasm of Lymphoid Tissue
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 2. Chapter 2: Neoplasms > t. Secondary malignant neoplasm of lymphoid tissue

content.full_text: When a malignant neoplasm of lymphoid tissue metastasizes beyond the lymph nodes, a code from categories C81-C85 with a final character identifying "extranodal and solid organ sites" should be assigned rather than a code for the secondary neoplasm of the affected solid organ. For example, for metastasis of diffuse large B-cell lymphoma to the lung, brain and left adrenal gland, assign code C83.398, Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma of other extranodal and solid organ sites. (Evidence: pg no: 39, L81-L84)
content.summary: Guidelines for coding lymphoid tissue malignancies that metastasize to solid organs (Evidence: pg no: 39, L81-L84)
key_concepts: Lymphoid tissue metastasis beyond lymph nodes (Evidence: pg no: 39, L81-L82)
Use C81-C85 with extranodal character (Evidence: pg no: 39, L82-L83)
Do not use secondary neoplasm codes for solid organs (Evidence: pg no: 39, L82-L83)
Example with diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (Evidence: pg no: 39, L83-L84)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Use code from C81-C85 with final character identifying "extranodal and solid organ sites" for lymphoid tissue metastasis (Evidence: pg no: 39, L81-L83)
detailed_rules.explanation: When lymphoid malignancies spread to solid organs, use the specific extranodal codes rather than secondary malignancy codes (Evidence: pg no: 39, L81-L83)
detailed_rules.applies_to: lymphoid malignancies metastasizing to solid organs
common_applications: Lymphoma spreading to other solid organs

detailed_rules.rule_text: Do not assign code for secondary neoplasm of the affected solid organ (Evidence: pg no: 39, L82-L83)
detailed_rules.explanation: Standard secondary malignancy codes (C77-C79) should not be used for lymphoid tissue metastases to solid organs (Evidence: pg no: 39, L82-L83)
common_applications: Avoiding C78.- codes for lymphoma in lung
Avoiding C79.- codes for lymphoma in other organs

workflow_steps: Step 1: Identify malignant neoplasm of lymphoid tissue
Step 2: Determine if metastasis extends beyond lymph nodes to solid organs
Step 3: Select appropriate code from C81-C85
Step 4: Use final character for "extranodal and solid organ sites"
Step 5: Do not add secondary neoplasm codes

Step 2: Note metastasis to multiple solid organs
Step 3: Select C83.3 for diffuse large B-cell lymphoma
Step 4: Use final character 98 for extranodal and solid organ sites

correct_coding.primary_code: C83.398 (Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma of other extranodal and solid organ sites)
correct_coding.rationale: Lymphoid tissue metastasis uses extranodal codes, not secondary neoplasm codes (Evidence: pg no: 39, L81-L84)

incorrect_coding.rationale: Should not use secondary neoplasm codes for lymphoid tissue metastases
incorrect_coding.common_mistake: Using secondary malignancy codes instead of extranodal lymphoma codes
